subtitles.text: Thoughtful thoughts to you, big brother gift teacher!
If you're going to say it, hold the top one.
Bananaman celebrated birthdays in April and May
The members bought gifts on their own with a budget of 5,000 yen as a guideline.
Then, Bananaman looked at the gifts given out and
Bananaman looked at the gifts and guessed which one was the gift for which person.
If he guesses wrong, Bananaman buys the gift with his own money
And he will be paid for it.
I don't like the idea of buying something for someone else.
Then what member wants me to get it wrong?
What's this? It's the middle of the moon.
Yes, it's like that, isn't it?
If you've gone as far as you can go... you can have something like this... as a memory.
I thought it would be nice if you could keep it in a corner of your mind as a memory.
You can buy this for 5,000 yen.
I got a moon certificate once.
At first I thought you didn't look like me.
I wonder if I'm easy to give the moon to.

So, wow, I don't know, seriously.

Yeah, I think she's a little older than you.

I think she's a little older now.
